common_issues.title: Infinite loading on authentication page after update
common_issues.description: Users on Pieces OS 11.3.0 (Windows) experience infinite loading at https://authentication.pieces.services/ after the update, preventing login. This might be due to a new authentication flow.  Suggested workarounds include logging in via the Pieces toolbar. The Pieces team is investigating and encourages users to share screen recordings for debugging.

related_issues.title: Stuck at https://authentication.pieces.services/
related_issues.text:
Stuck at https://authentication.pieces.services/
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application, Pieces OS

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

11.3.0

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

After updating pieces to latest version, I was loggged out (This was part of the update, which I saw in the update / release notes.). But when I try to log in, always end up at https://authentication.pieces.services/ without moving forward. that page keep loading and nothing happens.
## Summary of GitHub Issue Conversation

**Key Points:**

* Users are experiencing infinite loading on https://authentication.pieces.services/ after updating to Pieces OS version 11.3.0 on Windows 11. 
* This issue prevents users from linking their Google account.
* The problem seems to be related to a new authentication flow released the previous week.

**Problems Identified:**

* Infinite loading on the authentication page.
* Inability to link Google account.
* Debugging issue due to user refreshing the page manually.

**Solutions Proposed/Implemented:**

* Attempting login from Pieces toolbar.
* Sharing screen recordings for further investigation.
* Double-checking all authentication pipelines by the Pieces team.

**Current Status/Outcome:**

* The Pieces team is actively investigating the issue.
* No finalized solution has been implemented yet.
* Users are encouraged to share screen recordings for troubleshooting.

**Additional Notes:**

* The issue seems widespread among users who updated to Pieces OS version 11.3.0 on Windows 11.
* The infinite loading suggests a problem with the authentication flow or server-side issue.

recommendations: **Prioritize the authentication bug:** The infinite loading issue on the authentication page is severely impacting users. Allocate resources to investigate and resolve this urgently.

**Improve communication:** Keep users informed about the authentication issue, acknowledge the problem, and provide updates on the resolution progress. Consider a temporary banner or notification within the Pieces OS and desktop application.
**Gather more data:** Request affected users to share screen recordings to help reproduce and debug the authentication issue effectively.
**Review update procedures:** Investigate why the latest Pieces OS update led to the authentication issue. Review and enhance update testing procedures to prevent similar problems in future releases.
**Enhance documentation:** Create or update documentation to guide users on alternative login methods, such as using the Pieces toolbar, while the authentication issue is being resolved.
